All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Ingredient
The Ingredient class represents a single ingredient used in a recipe.
Main
* Main class to run the RecipeBox application.
Recipe
Represents a recipe that contains a name, number of servings, and a list of ingredients.
Recipe_Test
This class tests the Recipe class by: - Creating a hardcoded recipe using the parameterized constructor.
RecipeBox
RecipeBox class manages a collection of recipes.
